text: 350px The Gentleman's Dream, The Knight's Dream or Dillusion with the World is a 1650s vanitas painting by the Spanish artist Antonio de Pereda. It is now in the Real Academia de Bellas Artes de San Fernando, whose collections it entered in 1816. ==References== category:1650s paintings category:Spanish paintings Category:Paintings of the Real Academia de Bellas Artes de San Fernando Category:Angels in art
title: The Gentleman's Dream
